abstract: Anthony Arceneaux, owner of Hawk’s restaurant in Rayne, La, explains secret to his boiled crawfish and etoufee; 33-year-old Cajun country restaurant also offers variety of bread puddings.

headline.main: Where Crawfish Are Boiled, Fried and Celebrated

snippet: In Louisiana’s Cajun country, Hawk’s restaurant draws diners with spicy crawfish and doughnut bread pudding.
lead_paragraph: In Louisiana’s Cajun country, Hawk’s restaurant draws diners with spicy crawfish and doughnut bread pudding.
